sense.gloss: Burmese rosewood (Pterocarpus indicus), angsana, amboyna, amboina
flowering quince (of genus Chaenomeles) (Pseudocydonia sinensis), Chinese quince (Chaenomeles sinensis)
Chinese windmill palm (Trachycarpus fortunei), Chusan palm, hemp palm
miniature Chusan palm (Trachycarpus wagnerianus), (poss. Trachycarpus fortunei)

sdata.j: ↑棕櫚↑↓しゅろ↓ほうきは↑日本↑↓にほん↓の↑伝統↑↓でんとう↓↑的↑↓てき↓なほうきで、↑耐久↑↓たいきゅう↓↑性↑↓せい↓に↑優↑↓すぐ↓れ↑丈夫↑↓じょうふ↓で↑長持↑↓ながも↓ちします。
sdata.e: The hemp‐palm broom is a traditional Japanese broom that excels in durability, being both strong and long lasting.
